items.summary: Update the PhoneNumberSetup component to accept any numeric input without the '+' prefix, removing the 11-digit UK phone number validation and replacing it with worldwide phone number format that accepts any length numeric input
Update the backend savePhoneNumber endpoint validation to accept worldwide phone numbers by removing the 11-digit length requirement and accepting any numeric input without the '+' prefix
Add 'Haven't Added Phone Number' button to the PhoneNumberSetup dialog component that allows users to proceed with adding their phone number through the same interface when clicked

Update the App.tsx authentication flow to require all users (both new and existing) to provide a phone number on login if they haven't already, displaying the PhoneNumberSetup dialog and blocking access to all app features until phone number is saved
